summary: Original source line numbers are one-based in source maps.

comments.content: Generated source line/column numbers and original column numbers are zero-based. Original source line numbers should be zero based as well.

I assume this is a V3 source map encoding issue. Using the API the result should be 1 based, but the encoding should be 0 based (why waste a bit).  We won't change the V1/V2 encoding.

Pavel, can you update the v3 document with appropriate text?  It doesn't indicate the starting index for the encoded source location.
Added "zero-based" to all segment fields definitions.
This is just an encoding problem it won't affect users of the common library.
This issue was closed by revision r1596.
